I had troubles at first because I didnâ€™t realize you needed 6GB of storage to download skirmishes and other campaign maps but after that I have had so much fun with CoH. I definitely recommend it and it is an awesome game that more people should play.

title.label: Really enjoyed this game took me back to my childhood

content.label: Loved it! I only have one question, will there be an update with more campaign missions like opposing fronts or tales of valor extension?

title.label: I waited 25 years for this game!

content.label: I played a similar game on the internet in 1995, a squad based tactical WWII masterpiece. I played one time, for an hour and the game stayed in my mind for 25 until I happened upon this wonderful gem COMPANY OF HEROS. Worth every penny and every gigabyte!
Just amazing this is what I wanted just amazing
Letâ€™s get some mods please!!! Awesome game tho!!!

This game is well worth every penny, an older yet great PC titled game that I still play today. Since its release on iOS Iâ€™ve been hooked, love the challenging experience and a great campaign storyline, controls are very easy to understand and use. After completing the campaign on all difficulties, then on to skirmish battles. Lots of different scenarios, not every game being just the same as the last keeps it entertaining. I do hope to see more content released eventually. And future updates to hopefully fix the random crashes that I experience only on skirmish battles. I think is related to my phone hitting a really hot temperatures, doesnâ€™t drain my battery which is a huge plus for this game.
I love this game itâ€™s good I hope there will be add on like the one with the soviet union in it^^

title.label: Very good but serious bug issues

content.label: The game is an excellent, and is perfectly tailored for mobile, however there are a few bugs that make the game unplayable, it being rts. Units will sometimes freeze after taking enemy machine guns, the exit button will not work sometimes if there is a unit garrisoned in a building, usually after loading a save. Other from that the game is very nice, but please please fix these soon, I had no problem spending 14$ on this game, but these bugs seriously devalue the game.

A great game, Now here is my tip. If you play the Skrim maps as the Allies, and the Axis and spamming foot troops, get a M4. Arm it with the crab flail and machine gun. Then you turn the flail on and run over the foot troops

Game crashes constantly, troops wonâ€™t move no matter how many times you click on them or a location.  Tutorial barely touches on most of the commands and it took me ten tries to get the engineers to properly use a satchel charge.  Most of the times the troops just acknowledge the command then stay put.  Or go to the wrong side of cover. Even when grouped only part of the group actually moves.  Between crashing, poor AI and wonky controls it took forever to get through the tutorials and I am still trying to finish Omaha Beach!

title.label: Most expensive game Iâ€™ve purchased on the AppStore but totally worth it

content.label: The second I saw this was out for iPhone I bought it without thinking twice. I totally loved this game for PC and now I can play it on my iPhone! This game is the king of ww2 strategy games.

Itâ€™s my all time favorite strategy games.. never played any other game other than this one. Itâ€™s realistic and I never gat tired of playing it. Hoping other upgrades can be played here in iPad too.

Also the game is pretty much a battery drainer ( even with the battery saver on ! ). Other than that , didnâ€™t really find anything wrong with the game itself. I finished the campaign within a few days and still having fun with the skirmishes! If you could please remake COH 2 for IOS Iâ€™d gladly buy it

This is legitimately one of the best RTS games on mobile to date, I love the campaign and enjoy even more the skirmish game mode. I only wish that we were some how able to play it against other people! Hope to see a response about if this feature will be coming to mobile anytime soon!
Bring in the British and Panzer Elite and this will be mobile perfection.
You don't support the British army?

I played it one time for training then I had to go to work come back do an update on the iPad. And now after iPad update the game crashes I didnâ€™t even get to play it please fix soon.

Even when I play on easy itâ€™s ridiculous, I had an enemy sniper jump in and out of a structure while my machine gun team would nonstop setup and takedown their system, I tried to get them into a structure but the enemy sniper would jump in and out of whichever structure the team tried to enter while taking shots at the team (all while the AI was able to watch an entirely different part of the map attacking with vehicles). I took my losses and sent a mortar team to destroy the snipers lone structure. The mortar team (well within range) setup and took down their mortar a few dozen times, and kept inching closer each time, until finally the sniper killed all three without a single mortar being fired. AI is able to see the entire map and control all units at all times making gameplay of scrolling and selecting on a phone painfully unequal. I regret spending my money on this.
I mean what is the point without multiplayer online or even local skirmishes? Waste.
Great game. Worth buying

Great game, good memories, but almost unplayable on an iPhone. Thereâ€™s a lot of things happening around a big battlefield and the squads get really hard to select and tell what to do in heat of battle.

Hi Love Mil sim games so much but itâ€™s hard to come by one thatâ€™s well made and fun but this is very much like a PC mil sim and itâ€™s soooooo good they only thing I would say is that they should have a sandbox mode where you can create your own battles and watch them play out
Keeps crashing. Save often

I have been using the App Store for 10 years now and this is hands down the best strategy game that I have ever played. Before this game was on the App Store I used to play it for hours when it was on PC and when it came to the App Store I was thrilled. Feral did an amazing job of bring this game to mobile devices the graphics are top notch and the mobile controls are excellent. You can spend hours and hours playing the skirmish mode so for the price you will definitely get your money worth out of this game. I really hope they add the expansion packs like they have on the PC version it would take this game to another level if you hand more options to choose from rather then just German or American the expansion packs had British and other German unites. It may seem expensive to buy this game but for the amount to time that one can spend playing it you will not regret buying this game.
crashes on startup on the iPhone XR despite being listed as a supported device
